attributes.action: Ban all hamster cages under the minimum of 80cm by 50cm!
attributes.additional_details: Wood Greens Animal Sanctuary minimum is 80cm by 50cm, here is the link to show this:  https://woodgreen.org.uk/pet-advice/article/introduction-to-hamsters#:~:text=The%20ideal%20size%20is%20an,with%20a%206mm%20bar%20spacing. cages that are too small can cause a huge amount of stress and is cruel... Help raise the minimum of hamster cages to 80cm by 50cm.
attributes.background: We can all agree that some of the cages out there for hamsters is shocking and too small for a permanent home. I'm starting this petition to keep the minumum of 80cm by 50cm and ban all cages below this minumum.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Require a minimum size for hutches and cages for animals:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597222
